arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
وَ مَا فِيْهِ وَ فِيْهِ اسْمُكَ الْأَكْبَرُ
أَنْ تَجْعَلَنِيْ مِنْ عُتَقَائِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah I beseech Thee in the name of Thy revealed Book
and that which is in it, and Thy Great Name
and Thy (Other] beautiful names are in it,
and in it there is that which warns and gives hope
to include me among those who have been set free from the Hellfire.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
wa mā fīhi wa fīhismukal akbar
